comments: Row m=3 of the array A(3; m,n) := (2*n+m)!!/m!!, m >= 0, n >= 0.
references: H. W. Gould, Harris Kwong, Jocelyn Quaintance, On Certain Sums of Stirling Numbers with Binomial Coefficients, J. Integer Sequences, 18 (2015), #15.9.6.
links: Guo-Niu Han, Enumeration of Standard Puzzles [Cached copy]
formula: a(n) = (2*n+3)!!/3!!; e.g.f.: 1/(1-2*x)^(5/2).a(n) ~ 4/3*sqrt(2)*n^2*2^n*e^-n*n^n*{1 + 47/24*n^-1 + ...}. - Joe Keane (jgk(AT)jgk.org), Nov 23 2001Ramanujan polynomials -psi_n(n, x) evaluated at 0. - _Ralf Stephan_, Apr 16 2004a(n) = 2^(2+n)*Gamma(n+5/2)/(3*sqrt(Pi)). - _Gerson Washiski Barbosa_, May 05 2010
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
